translation.aboutUsTitle: Hydro <1>$H2O</1> is a community owned, fair launched Reward Protocol
translation.aboutUsDescription: Hydro operates using is a frictionless yield and liquidity generation smart contract which applies a <1>5%</1> fee to each buy transaction; and <1>10%</1> to each sell. This transaction fee is split into two portions which serve separate functions.
translation.aboutUsPoint2: A tax for each buy or sell transaction is collected
translation.aboutUsPoint3: 20% of the taxes gets added to the Liquidity Pool
translation.aboutUsPoint4: 80% of the taxes get elaborated by the buyback system
translation.aboutUsPoint5: 80% of previously collected taxes gets swapped into reward token and redistributed among Hydro Holders
